> <OLD>
>
> "Unicrom... what is the involvement of him in all this mess??? " and looking
> to Jhiaxus said "Tell me all that you remember from your missing till you
> woke up? Do yo uknow how do we arrive here???"

<NEW>

SCORPONOK escorted HYDRAS into what appeared to be the cockpit area of
the ship they were on, it was where JHIAXUS was seated.

"I don't know much." JHIAXUS said quietly as he flew the ship.

Outside the ship they were flying over a broken landscape. The land
outside looked dried out and scorched as if it had been blasted
multiple times by high yield explosives.

SCORPONOK intoned darkly, "We awoke changed back into what you see."
He was refering to their size.

All of them, HYDRAS as well as JHIAXUS and SCORPONOK were the size
they were when DECEPTICONS ruled CYBERTRON before the great reduction.

JHIAXUS grunted, "We woke up inside of some sort of cell a few days
ago. We escaped and started exploring this place."

"Yeah, we found you, it looks like you were captured in the same
manner as we were." SCORPONOK said, "A few Seekers were bringing you
in."

JHIAXUS nodded, "We stole their ship and we are having it take us back
to where it brought you from." He paused and then said, "Wherever that
is."

The ship continued to fly over the broken and shattered landscape, on
JHIAXUS' panel it was obvious he was using some sort of autopilot to
fly the ship and perhaps get them back.

A small light was beeping on the panel showing their destination.

(TAG)

- Preston
